headline: NextEra Energy to meet with investors throughout June
summary: NextEra Energy, Inc. (NYSE: NEE) today announced that members of the senior management team will participate in various investor meetings throughout June to discuss, among other things, long-term growth-rate expectations. Investors and other interested parties can access a copy of the most recent presentation materials at www.NextEraEnergy.com/investors.

headline: NextEra (NEE) Is Considered a Good Investment by Brokers: Is That True?
summary: According to the average brokerage recommendation (ABR), one should invest in NextEra (NEE). It is debatable whether this highly sought-after metric is effective because Wall Street analysts' recommendations tend to be overly optimistic. Would it be worth investing in the stock?
